Body:
"""Check hansenlaw forward tansform with a Gaussian function"""
n = 1001
r_max = 501
ref = abel.tools.analytical.GaussianAnalytical(n, r_max, symmetric=False,
    sigma=200)
recon = abel.hansenlaw.hansenlaw_transform(ref.func, ref.dr, direction=
    'forward')
ratio = abel.benchmark.absolute_ratio_benchmark(ref, recon, kind='forward')
assert_allclose(ratio, 1.0, rtol=0.07, atol=0)
